A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The biggest problem this film has\, is that Disney completely ignored all the emotional attachment an entire generation had garnered towards Luke Skywalker. I watched it twice\, and I won't be watching it again. Ever. I skipped Revenge of the Sith because of how awful the first 2 prequels were\, I suspect I'll be skipping episode 9 now. Sad day indeed. :(
